name: 數位公關廣告策略與規劃
description: This course is designed to introduce students to theoretical and practical perspectives of advertising/PR. The course will cover broad topics, including an introduction to related concepts, history, origin, essential features, descriptive elements, and the impact of advertising/PR on the marketing process. This course introduces not only how tactics are executed, but also helps students explore how strategies are employed in market segmentation, consumer behavior analyses, and marketing communication. Current domestic and international cases will be used as examples. Therefore, students will learn the language, key concepts, techniques, and strategic approaches in the development and implementation of advertising/PR programs and campaigns.
goals: learn the use of theoretical concepts of advertising and practical marketing tools
design effective and powerful advertising/PR plans to drive sales, build brand loyalty, and achieve marketing objectives
develop critical analytical skills in the evaluation of advertising/PR campaigns and research
syllabus:
•此門課程協助學生探索公關與廣告重要理論與研究，其中包含廣告、行銷、心理學等相關學門，同時輔以國內外案例進行公關廣告行銷策略之分析。在實作部分，讓同學透過訪問公關廣告公司，以瞭解行銷企劃案發想、撰寫、執行的過程，然後，將訪問案子以企劃案呈現，與同學們進行討論交流。學期中將安排公關廣告行銷專業人士到課堂上演講，介紹相關案例，或到公關廣告公司進行參訪。

第1週Class Introduction and Overview

第2週Introduction to Advertising & IMC

第3週Determinants of Advertising Strategy

第4週Perspectives on Consumer Behavior

第5週Developing Marketing and Advertising Plans

第6週Planning Media Strategy/Creative Strategy

第7週Print Ad & TV Ad & Radio Ad

第8週Digital Interactive Media

第9週Proposal Presentation

第10週Social Media

第11週Introduction to PR

第12週PR Process: Research/Program Planning

第13週PR Process: Communication/Evaluation

第14週Crisis Communications & Risk Management

第15週News Releases, Newsletters & Brochures

第16週Guest Speaker

第17週Wrap Up and Review/ Group Project Meetings

第18週Project Presentations
